content.text: <ctrl46><ctrl46><ctrl46><ctrl46>The game is now feature-complete, but it doesn't adapt to different screen sizes. I will refactor the code to make it fully responsive. This involves recalculating the sizes and positions of all game elements whenever the window is resized. This will ensure the game looks great on any display.
